title: Wallets | Polkadex Orderbook
heading: Wallets
noTradingAccountDescription: Trading accounts allow you to deposit funds to Orderbook, trade and withdraw funds to your Polkadex account.
accountNotPresentInBrowser: Account not present in the browser
disclaimerMessage: Trading accounts will be lost if browser cache is cleared. But do not worry, your funds will not be lost. You can create an other one. Do not transfer funds directly to your Trading address.
noWalletFoundDescription: Wallets allow you to create trading accounts and make deposits. Use your Polkadot {.js} extension wallet.
deleteAccountDescription: This action is irreversible, please make sure you`re certain of it.

intro.title: Funding wallet and trading account differences
intro.description: We'll guide you through these new processes on a quick tour.

faq.title: Setting up your first trading account
faq.description: Discover step by step how to create a trading account and start trading on Orderbook.
